item.title: krawl the cluster for errors and events
item.description: When you work on kubernetes clusters, it isn’t the tools natural complexity you are more worried about. It is actually what comes along with it. The trouble to run multiple commands to find out the issue in development phase of the application. Of-course, you can use aliases to speed up a bit and skip typing the complete command yourself. You still have to find the exact cause of the issue and it will take time, no matter what, unless an obvious error happens.
